entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 2.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm across lower Richelieu. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 4 cm across lower Richelieu. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
